text: Hot Fuzz is a 2007 British-French action-comedy movie. It was directed by Edgar Wright, who co-wrote it with Simon Pegg. The movie stars Pegg and Nick Frost. It is set in Gloucestershire. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:2007 comedy movies Category:2007 action movies Category:2000s buddy comedy movies Category:2000s criminal comedy movies Category:2000s parody movies Category:2000s serial killer movies Category:Action comedy movies Category:British action movies Category:British buddy movies Category:British comedy movies Category:British criminal comedy movies Category:Buddy cop movies Category:2000s English-language movies Category:French action movies Category:French comedy movies Category:Gloucestershire Category:Movies directed by Edgar Wright
title: Hot Fuzz
